A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The movie perfectly executes everything it needed to do to make the most money in the shortest amount of time.
The franchise got completely destroyed from a story perspective but that does not matter at all in Hollywood.

They made damn sure to cut off all bridges to the original star wars\, while including absolutely no new or interesting storylines or characters.

The story is also unfortunately ideologically motivated\, championed by the absolut forced relationship between a black guy and an asian chick. 
The also go to a casino planet that is used to not-so-subtly criticize rich people in general (haha\, disney).
It should be clear this is riding the current zeitgeist of diversitiy ideology and all that comes with it.

And do yourself a favour and detach from everything Star Wars for the future.
It was good while it lasted and lets move on and not give those destructive people money.
